item.title: Fran add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Fran add a quote by Walter Anderson
item.description: "Our lives improve only when we take chances - and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves." -- Walter Anderson

item.title: Fran add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Fran add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "The way to happiness: Keep your heart free from hate, your mind from worry. Live simply, expect little, give much. Scatter sunshine, forget self, think of others. Try this for a week and you will be surprised." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Fran add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "It's funny how humans can wrap their mind around things and fit them into their version of reality." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Fran add a quote by Chad Sugg
item.description: "If you're reading this... Congratulations, you're alive. If that's not something to smile about, then I don't know what is." -- Chad Sugg
